qa_pairs.question: What is the connection between the founder's qualifications and the academic programs offered at Avinash College of Commerce?
qa_pairs.answer: <statement>The founder of Avinash College of Commerce, Avinash Brahmadevara, is a post-graduate triple-qualified commerce professional [S3]. This qualification likely influenced the academic focus of the institution, which offers a range of commerce-related programs such as BBA, B.Com., and professional courses like CA, CWA, CS, and CMA [S6][S7][S9].<cite>[S3][S6][S7][S9]</cite></statement>
qa_pairs.chunk:
Passage 1:
[S1] Avinash College of Commerce


# Avinash College of Commerce



**Avinash College of Commerce** is an educational institute that trains students in commerce and professional courses. [S2] It is located in Hyderabad in the state of Telangana, India, and opened in 2013. [S3] The institute is founded by Avinash Brahmadevara, a post-graduate triple-qualified commerce professional. [S4] ## Academics


### Philosophy

The core philosophy of the college lies in its industry-oriented pedagogy that emphasizes industry-preparedness, business skills and professional ethics. [S5] ### Courses

The college offers intermediate courses in Economics and Commerce. [S6] It also offers undergraduate courses such as Bachelor of Business Administration (BBA) and Bachelor of Commerce (B.Com.) and provides coaching for professional courses in commerce namely Chartered Accountancy (CA), Cost Accounting (CWA) and Company secretary (CS). [S7] It also provides part-time courses for professionals
. [S8] The college also provides Certified Management Accountant (CMA) course in India. [S9] ### Affiliations

The college is affiliated to Osmania University for its regular courses. [S10] For the CMA course, it has partnered with the Institute of Management Accountants (IMA USA). [S11] ## Life on Campus

The campus is known for its fun-filled atmosphere and cultural events.

qa_pairs.question: What affiliations does Avinash College of Commerce have, and which specific courses are they linked to?
qa_pairs.answer: <statement>The Avinash College of Commerce is affiliated with Osmania University for its regular courses.<cite>[S10]</cite></statement> <statement>The college is also affiliated with the Institute of Management Accountants (IMA USA) for the Certified Management Accountant (CMA) course.<cite>[S11]</cite></statement> <statement>The regular courses affiliated with Osmania University include intermediate programs in Economics and Commerce, as well as undergraduate programs like Bachelor of Business Administration (BBA) and Bachelor of Commerce (B.Com.).<cite>[S6][S7]</cite></statement> <statement>The CMA course, affiliated with IMA USA, is specifically offered as a professional commerce course.<cite>[S9]</cite></statement>
